comment.body:
> [p2p](#comment_12_13Z7XxTa7JuFat3KzzMWu3onwM6biLuurJ): hi, i'm back!i found a bug (maybe): i didn't use ZeroNet for many days and i started using it yesterday, but some sites didn't automatically  update for all new contents, after waiting for some hours i had to manually click the update button  for 2~3 times to get all new contents.i have been using Tor, is that the cause? if it is, pls make zeronet automatically  update more frequently for tor users. THX!

me too

> [mod](#comment_1_1GCsW9TFfjDsvcdmKPADq1n8Q3ha72UtDQ): Does ZeroBundle update automatically when you run it or do you have to manually update it?

its automatic.
